tutorial: How to Set up a New Chart

definition.text: Naming nodes is important to make sure your workspace stays organized. Not to mention it makes it easier to know which chart you are looking at in the Charting Space!

paragraphs.text: Make sure to name Dashboards with something you will recognize. A good naming practice is to reference the type of environment (live trading, backtesting, etc.) and network name.  For us that would be:
When naming a Time Machine it is helpful to reference the Trading System and type of Trading Session that will be connected to the chart. For us that would be:
